tns:patch.author: jdeanquin
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_project_implementation_mode; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_project_implementation_mode AS SELECT a.amp_activity_id, CASE WHEN acv.id IS NULL THEN '' ELSE acv.category_value END AS project_implementation_mode, acv.id AS project_implementation_mode_id FROM amp_activities_categoryvalues aac JOIN amp_category_value acv ON aac.amp_categoryvalue_id = acv.id JOIN amp_category_class acc ON acc.id = acv.amp_category_class_id AND acc.keyname = 'project_implementation_mode' RIGHT JOIN amp_activity_version a ON a.amp_activity_id = aac.amp_activity_id;
